custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommercePriceListAccountRel.commercePriceListAccountRelId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommercePriceListAccountRel JOIN CommercePriceList ON CommercePriceListAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId JOIN CommerceAccount ON CommercePriceListAccountRel.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId WHERE (CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId = ?) AND (LOWER(CommerceAccount.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT DISTINCT CommercePriceListAccountRel.* FROM CommercePriceListAccountRel JOIN CommercePriceList ON CommercePriceListAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId JOIN CommerceAccount ON CommercePriceListAccountRel.commerceAccountId = CommerceAccount.commerceAccountId WHERE (CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId = ?) AND (LOWER(CommerceAccount.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommercePriceListChannelRel.CommercePriceListChannelRelId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommercePriceListChannelRel JOIN CommercePriceList ON CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId JOIN CommerceChannel ON CommercePriceListChannelRel.commerceChannelId = CommerceChannel.commerceChannelId WHERE (CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId = ?) AND (LOWER(CommerceChannel.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT DISTINCT CommercePriceListChannelRel.* FROM CommercePriceListChannelRel JOIN CommercePriceList ON CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId JOIN CommerceChannel ON CommercePriceListChannelRel.commerceChannelId = CommerceChannel.commerceChannelId WHERE (CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId = ?) AND (LOWER(CommerceChannel.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.CPLCommerceAccountGroupRelId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel JOIN CommercePriceList ON CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId JOIN CommerceAccountGroup ON CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commerceAccountGroupId = CommerceAccountGroup.commerceAccountGroupId WHERE (CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId = ?) AND (LOWER(CommerceAccountGroup.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT DISTINCT CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.* FROM CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel JOIN CommercePriceList ON CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId JOIN CommerceAccountGroup ON CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commerceAccountGroupId = CommerceAccountGroup.commerceAccountGroupId WHERE (CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId = ?) AND (LOWER(CommerceAccountGroup.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommercePriceList INNER JOIN CommercePriceModifier ON CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceModifier.commercePriceListId INNER JOIN CommercePriceModifierRel ON CommercePriceModifier.commercePriceModifierId = CommercePriceModifierRel.commercePriceModifierId WHERE (CommercePriceModifierRel.classNameId = ?) AND (CommercePriceModifierRel.classPK = ?) AND (LOWER(CommercePriceList.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
SELECT COUNT(CommercePriceEntry.commercePriceEntryId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommercePriceEntry WHERE CommercePriceEntry.CPInstanceUuid = ?

SELECT CommercePriceEntry.* FROM CommercePriceEntry JOIN CommercePriceList ON CommercePriceEntry.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId WHERE (CommercePriceEntry.CPInstanceUuid = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.type_ = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.catalogBasePriceList = [$TRUE$])

SELECT CommercePriceList.* FROM CommercePriceList WHERE (CommercePriceList.expirationDate < ?) AND (CommercePriceList.expirationDate IS NOT NULL) AND ([$OWNER_USER_ID$] [$OWNER_USER_ID_AND_OR_CONNECTOR$] ([$STATUS$]))

SELECT CommercePriceList.* FROM CommercePriceListAccountRel INNER JOIN CommercePriceList ON CommercePriceListAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId LEFT JOIN CommercePriceListChannelRel ON CommercePriceListAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListId WHERE (CommercePriceListAccountRel.commerceAccountId = ?) AND (CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListChannelRelId IS NULL) AND (CommercePriceList.groupId = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.type_ = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.status = 0) ORDER BY CommercePriceList.priority DESC

SELECT DISTINCT CommercePriceList.* FROM CommercePriceList INNER JOIN CommercePriceModifier ON CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceModifier.commercePriceListId INNER JOIN CommercePriceModifierRel ON CommercePriceModifier.commercePriceModifierId = CommercePriceModifierRel.commercePriceModifierId WHERE (CommercePriceModifierRel.classNameId = ?) AND (CommercePriceModifierRel.classPK = ?) AND (LOWER(CommercePriceList.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
SELECT CommercePriceEntry.* FROM CommercePriceEntry WHERE CommercePriceEntry.CPInstanceUuid = ?

SELECT CommercePriceList.* FROM CommercePriceListChannelRel INNER JOIN CommercePriceListAccountRel ON CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceListAccountRel.commercePriceListId INNER JOIN CommercePriceList ON CommercePriceListAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId WHERE (CommercePriceListChannelRel.commerceChannelId = ?) AND (CommercePriceListAccountRel.commerceAccountId = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.groupId = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.type_ = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.status = 0) ORDER BY CommercePriceList.priority DESC

SELECT CommercePriceList.* FROM CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel INNER JOIN CommercePriceList ON CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId LEFT JOIN CommercePriceListChannelRel ON CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListId WHERE (CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commerceAccountGroupId IN ([$ACCOUNT_GROUP_IDS$])) AND (CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListChannelRelId IS NULL) AND (CommercePriceList.groupId = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.type_ = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.status = 0) ORDER BY CommercePriceList.priority DESC

SELECT CommercePriceList.* FROM CommercePriceListChannelRel INNER JOIN CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel ON CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListId = CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commercePriceListId INNER JOIN CommercePriceList ON CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId WHERE (CommercePriceListChannelRel.commerceChannelId = ?) AND (CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commerceAccountGroupId IN ([$ACCOUNT_GROUP_IDS$])) AND (CommercePriceList.groupId = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.type_ = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.status = 0) ORDER BY CommercePriceList.priority DESC

SELECT CommercePriceList.* FROM CommercePriceListChannelRel INNER JOIN CommercePriceList ON CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId WHERE (CommercePriceListChannelRel.commerceChannelId = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.groupId = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.type_ = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.status = 0) ORDER BY CommercePriceList.priority DESC

SELECT CommercePriceList.* FROM CommercePriceList LEFT JOIN CommercePriceListAccountRel ON CommercePriceListAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId LEFT JOIN CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel ON CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId LEFT JOIN CommercePriceListChannelRel ON CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId WHERE (CommercePriceList.groupId = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.type_ = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.status = 0) AND (CommercePriceListAccountRel.commercePriceListAccountRelId IS NULL) AND (CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.cPLCommerceAccountGroupRelId IS NULL) AND (CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListChannelRelId IS NULL) ORDER BY CommercePriceList.priority DESC, CommercePriceList.catalogBasePriceList ASC

SELECT CommercePriceEntry.* FROM CommercePriceEntry INNER JOIN CommercePriceList ON CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceEntry.commercePriceListId LEFT JOIN CommercePriceListAccountRel ON CommercePriceListAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId LEFT JOIN CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel ON CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId LEFT JOIN CommercePriceListChannelRel ON CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListId = CommercePriceList.commercePriceListId WHERE (CommercePriceEntry.CPInstanceUuid = ?) AND (CommercePriceEntry.status = 0) AND (CommercePriceList.groupId = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.type_ = ?) AND (CommercePriceList.status = 0) AND ( (CommercePriceListAccountRel.commerceAccountId = ?) OR (CommercePriceListAccountRel.commercePriceListAccountRelId IS NULL) ) AND ( (CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.commerceAccountGroupId IN ([$ACCOUNT_GROUP_IDS$])) OR (CPLCommerceGroupAccountRel.cPLCommerceAccountGroupRelId IS NULL) ) AND ( (CommercePriceListChannelRel.commerceChannelId = ?) OR (CommercePriceListChannelRel.commercePriceListChannelRelId IS NULL) ) ORDER BY CommercePriceEntry.price ASC
